title: S2 Ep41: The economics of an ageing population
itunes:title: The economics of an ageing population
description: We are living longer, and that affects every part of our economic future. David Bloom is the editor of a new VoxEU book on what he calls "the what, the so what, and the now what" of ageing. He tells Tim Phillips about some of the policy choices our societies will have to make in the near future.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
